title: 325F.135 UNSAFE RECALLED TOYS; PROHIBITION ON SALE.
text:
(a) No commercial retailer shall sell in this state a toy that the commercial retailer knows at the time of the sale has been recalled for any safety-related reason by an agency of the federal government or by the toy's manufacturer, wholesaler, distributor, or importer.
(b) For purposes of this section, "toy" means an item designed primarily for the purpose of play activity by children under the age of 12 years and "recalled" excludes corrective actions that involve safety alerts, parts replacement, or consumer repairs.
(c) This section shall be enforced under sections 325F.14 to 325F.16.
